entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
